name: Tentacular
abstract: Inhabit the giant body of a mighty-yet-mild tentacle monster raised by the quirky townsfolk of La Kalma, a remote island colony packed with puzzles!

detail.app_languages: Simplified Chinese, German, English, Russian, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, French, Spanish
detail.app_release_note:
We are really excited to announce that the Island Builder Expansion is now available, free to all players of Tentacular!

The expansion is adding the option for players to create their own Islands from scratch. The new Creation Glove will allow all of you to freely build and rule your newly created islands to your heart’s content. You can choose to be benevolent rulers, or wreck havoc on your newly formed civilizations – it’s your choice!

In addition to adding a ton of content to the sandbox mode, we also went a step further and created additional side missions and challenges! These side missions feature La Kalma’s sister island, Salmoa, and sees the return of everyone’s favorite tentacled friend. A very special side quest lets you meet the development team and even features a brand new boss battle.
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO Neo3 Link, PICO 4, PICO 4 Pro
